content: Duangdao Wichadakul is a lecturer at the Department of Computer Engineering, Faculty of Engineering, Chulalongkorn University. Her research interests include the design and development of new computational methods for various -omics data analyses, the application of machine learning methods for solving various kinds of biological problems, and the building of software platforms and bioinformatics tools that can help accelerate research methods in molecular biology and biomedicine.

title: Duangdao Wichadakul
